The guard Renford:
Phew ... I understand what you want. But for now the problem is not only Sakuma. This has created a monster Kanilova with Poslovom that would eat with them using the energy of living things.
Now the soldiers on the Heath are trying their stop ... But they are few, and they seem to be lacking abilities. Find Guardian Joel on Heathland and destroy together Kanilova. When get a handle on this monster, Joel will show the way to Sakuma. I really hope for you.
